trans-unit.target: Associa un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> al relativo componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph> class contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A> property, which points back to the glyph's related component.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph> classe contiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A> proprietà, che fa riferimento al componente correlato dell'icona.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to trace <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects back to their component, such as during drag operations.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata per traccia <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> oggetti nuovamente ai relativi componenti, ad esempio durante le operazioni di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: Componente al quale è associato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: Componente al quale è associato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> al quale è associato l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" />.
Punto da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il clic del mouse nel punto specificato deve essere gestito dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> è associato a <paramref name="p" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita non esegue alcuna operazione e restituisce `null`.
L'implementazione predefinita non esegue alcuna operazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> .
